title: Designing a Collaborative Professional Learning Community (PLC) to Enhance Teachers' AI Literacy

context.additional_context: A foundational competency development program for AI-driven educational innovation targeting science professionals.

learning_goals: Identifying three AI tools usable in educational settings and explaining their basic functionalities
Collaborating with PLC (Professional Learning Community) members to develop one AI-based lesson design prototype
Analyzing the strengths and weaknesses of AI-integrated educational cases and suggesting improvement plans
Deriving at least two ethical issues that may arise when using AI and establishing resolution strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
